General.Name: Hangzhou Steam Turbine
General.Description: Hangzhou Turbine Power Group Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, sells, and services steam turbines, gas turbines, and spare parts in China. The company offers steam turbines for industries, power plants, and renewable. Its products are used in various industries, including power plants, petrochemicals, chemicals, fertilizers, metallurgy, building materials, and light industry. The company also exports its products to the United States, Australia, Russia, Finland, Turkey, Iran, India, Thailand, South-east Asia, Africa, the Middle East, etc. The company was formerly known as Hangzhou Steam Turbine Power Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hangzhou Turbine Power Group Co., Ltd. in April 2023. Hangzhou Turbine Power Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

4.Name: Ms. Guiwen  Li
4.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
